threats.title: Impersonation of Users
threats.description: Weak authentication mechanisms could allow unauthorized access.
threats.mitigation: Enforce strong password policies and CAPTCHA verification.

threats.title: Denying Actions Performed
threats.description: An admin may manipulate logs to cover unauthorized actions
threats.mitigation: Ensure log integrity with hash-based verification.

threats.title: Unauthorized Privileges
threats.description: A compromised admin account could lead to full system control
threats.mitigation: Enforce least privilege principles and continuous monitoring

threats.title: Fake Website
threats.description: Attackers could create a fake login page that looks identical to the User Interaction Management system Users might enter their credentials, which attackers can then use to access the real system.
threats.mitigation: Use HTTPS & SSL Certificates and enable Two-Factor Authentication and Educate Users on Phishing Awareness by sending awareness massages

threats.title: Service Disruption
threats.description: Attackers may flood the system with excessive queries
threats.mitigation: Implement rate limiting and CAPTCHA verification

threats.title: Impersonation of Users
threats.description: An attacker may impersonate a legitimate student or admin to gain unauthorized access.
threats.mitigation: use multi-factor authentication (MFA) and enforce stong password policy

threats.title: Unauthorized Privileges
threats.description: Attackers may exploit weak authentication to gain admin privileges
threats.mitigation: Use role-based access control (RBAC) and privilege separation and Least Privilege Principle

threats.title: Data Leakage
threats.description: AI responses may reveal confidential data
threats.mitigation: Implement data masking and response filtering mechanisms

threats.title: Unauthorized Data Alteration
threats.description: Malicious users may attempt to bypass filtering and sanitization.
threats.mitigation: Implement input validation and secure coding practices.

threats.title: Denying Actions Performed
threats.description: Users may deny performing certain actions if logs are not properly maintained
threats.mitigation: Implement cryptographic logging and audit trails

threats.title: Service Disruption
threats.description: Log storage may be overwhelmed, affecting system performance
threats.mitigation: Use log rotation and scalable storage solutions

threats.title: Unauthorized Data Alteration
threats.description: Attackers may tamper with stored credentials or user queries.
threats.mitigation: Use hashing and encryption for stored credentials and ensure of securing the communication using ssh/tls

threats.title: Data Leakage
threats.description: Sensitive user information or system logs may be leaked
threats.mitigation: Use access controls and encryption for sensitive data and use Least Privilege Principle

threats.title: Data Leakage
threats.description: Sensitive user information or system logs may be leaked
threats.mitigation: Use access controls and encryption for sensitive data
